TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit NotifyIcon extends System.ComponentModel.Component
Public NotInheritable Class NotifyIcon Inherits Component
public ref class NotifyIcon sealed : System::ComponentModel::Component

summary.span: 指定可在通知区域创建图标的组件。

span.span: Specifies a component that creates an icon in the notification area.

summary.span: 无法继承此类。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通知区域中的图标是在计算机后台运行的进程（如病毒防护程序或卷控件）的快捷方式。Icons in the notification area are shortcuts to processes that are running in the background of a computer, such as a virus protection program or a volume control. 这些进程不附带其自己的用户界面。These processes do not come with their own user interfaces. 类提供一种方式来编程此功能。The class provides a way to program in this functionality. 属性定义显示在通知区域中的图标。The property defines the icon that appears in the notification area. 图标的弹出菜单用 属性进行寻址。Pop-up menus for an icon are addressed with the property. 属性分配工具提示文本。The property assigns ToolTip text. 为了使图标显示在通知区域中， 属性必须设置为 `true`。In order for the icon to show up in the notification area, the property must be set to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类在通知区域中显示应用程序的图标。The following code example demonstrates using the class to display an icon for an application in the notification area. 该示例演示如何设置 、、和 属性以及如何处理 事件。The example demonstrates setting the , , , and properties and handling the event. 对其使用**Exit**项的 分配给 属性，该属性允许用户关闭应用程序。A with an **Exit** item on it is assigned to the property, which allows the user to close the application. 发生 事件时，通过调用 方法来激活应用程序窗体。When the event occurs, the application form is activated by calling the method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建新的 时， 属性设置为 "`false`"。When a new is created, the property is set to `false`. 必须将 属性设置为 `true` 才能使用创建的 。You must set the property to `true` in order to use the you created. 此实例将一直存在，直到其容器将其发布到垃圾回收。This instance will exist until its container releases it to garbage collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建新的 时， 属性设置为 "`false`"。When a new is created, the property is set to `false`. 必须将 属性设置为 `true` 才能使用创建的 。You must set the property to `true` in order to use the you created. 此实例将一直存在，直到其容器将其发布到垃圾回收。This instance will exist until its container releases it to garbage collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类在通知区域中显示应用程序的图标。The following code example demonstrates using the class to display an icon for an application in the notification area. 该示例演示如何设置 、、和 属性以及如何处理 事件。The example demonstrates setting the , , , and properties and handling the event. 对其使用**Exit**项的 分配给 属性，该属性允许用户关闭应用程序。A with an **Exit** item on it is assigned to the property, which allows the user to close the application. 发生 事件时，通过调用 方法来激活应用程序窗体。When the event occurs, the application form is activated by calling the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告 事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑将 替换为 或将消息附加到多行 中。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为 `NotifyIcon1` 类型实例的项目中。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `NotifyIcon1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与 事件关联。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 获取或设置图标的快捷菜单。

span.span: Gets or sets the shortcut menu for the icon.
The for the icon.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户右键单击任务栏通知区域中的图标时，会显示菜单。The menu is shown when the user right-clicks an icon in the notification area of the taskbar. 快捷菜单也称为弹出菜单。Shortcut menus also are known as pop-up menus. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类在通知区域中显示应用程序的图标。The following code example demonstrates using the class to display an icon for an application in the notification area. 该示例演示如何设置 、、和 属性以及如何处理 事件。The example demonstrates setting the , , , and properties and handling the event. 对其使用**Exit**项的 分配给 属性，该属性允许用户关闭应用程序。A with an **Exit** item on it is assigned to the property, which allows the user to close the application. 发生 事件时，通过调用 方法来激活应用程序窗体。When the event occurs, the application form is activated by calling the method. summary.span: 当用户按下鼠标按钮而指针悬停在任务栏通知区域的图标上时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user presses the mouse button while the pointer is over the icon in the notification area of the taskbar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告 事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑将 替换为 或将消息附加到多行 中。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为 `NotifyIcon1` 类型实例的项目中。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `NotifyIcon1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与 事件关联。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 在任务栏中显示气球提示。

span.span: Displays the balloon tip in the taskbar.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ShowBalloonTip(int32 timeout) cil managed

param.name: timeout
param.span: 气球状提示应显示的时间段，以毫秒为单位。

span.span: The time period, in milliseconds, the balloon tip should display.

para.span: 从 Windows Vista 开始，否决此参数。

span.span: This parameter is deprecated as of Windows Vista.

para.span: 现在通知显示时间是基于系统辅助功能设置。

span.span: Notification display times are now based on system accessibility settings.

summary.span: 指定时间段内在任务栏中显示气球状提示。

span.span: Displays a balloon tip in the taskbar for the specified time period.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最小和最大超时值是由操作系统强制执行的，并且通常分别为10和30秒，但这可能因操作系统而异。Minimum and maximum timeout values are enforced by the operating system and are typically 10 and 30 seconds, respectively, however this can vary depending on the operating system. 超时值太大或太小会调整到适当的最小值或最大值。Timeout values that are too large or too small are adjusted to the appropriate minimum or maximum value. 此外，如果用户似乎没有使用计算机（没有键盘或鼠标事件发生），则系统不会将此时间计入超时值。In addition, if the user does not appear to be using the computer (no keyboard or mouse events are occurring) then the system does not count this time towards the timeout. 任务栏上每次只能显示一个气球状提示。Only one balloon tip can display on the taskbar at a time. 如果任务栏当前显示一个气球状提示，则会导致忽略 `timeout` 值。Attempting to display a balloon tip when one is currently displayed on the taskbar causes the `timeout` value to be ignored. 此行为稍有不同，具体取决于操作系统以及气球提示是来自其他还是相同的应用程序。The behavior is slightly different depending on the operating system and whether the balloon tip is from another, or the same, application. 当第二个气球提示来自其他应用程序时，将在第二个气球提示显示最小超时值，而不考虑 `timeout`的值。When the second balloon tip is from another application, the first balloon tip will display for the minimum timeout value before the second appears, regardless of the value of `timeout`. 在大多数情况下，如果气球提示来自同一应用程序，则在调用 方法时，第一个气球提示会立即关闭。In most cases, if the balloon tips are from the same application, the first balloon tip immediately closes when another call to the method is made. 在某些情况下，第二个气球会在第一个气球顶部打开。In some cases the second balloon will open on top of the first balloon. 标题文本将以粗体显示在气球顶部附近。The title text will display in a bold font near the top of the balloon. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 若要运行此示例，请将示例代码粘贴到包含名为 `notifyIcon1`的 的 Windows 窗体中。To run this example, paste the example code into a Windows Form that contains a named `notifyIcon1`. 从窗体的构造函数或 事件处理方法调用 `SetBalloonTip`。Call `SetBalloonTip` from the form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIconBalloonTip#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIconBalloonTip/CS/Form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIconBalloonTip#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIconBalloonTip/VB/Form1.vb#2)]

span.span: is less than 0.

MemberSignature.Value: public void ShowBalloonTip (int timeout, string tipTitle, string tipText, System.Windows.Forms.ToolTipIcon tipIcon);

Public Sub ShowBalloonTip (timeout As Integer, tipTitle As String, tipText As String, tipIcon As ToolTipIcon)
public: void ShowBalloonTip(int timeout, System::String ^ tipTitle, System::String ^ tipText, System::Windows::Forms::ToolTipIcon tipIcon);
member this.ShowBalloonTip : int * string * string * System.Windows.Forms.ToolTipIcon -> unit

param.name: timeout
param.span: 气球状提示应显示的时间段，以毫秒为单位。

span.span: The time period, in milliseconds, the balloon tip should display.

para.span: 从 Windows Vista 开始，否决此参数。

span.span: This parameter is deprecated as of Windows Vista.

para.span: 现在通知显示时间是基于系统辅助功能设置。

span.span: Notification display times are now based on system accessibility settings.

param.name: tipTitle
param.span: 要在气球状提示上显示的标题。

span.span: The title to display on the balloon tip.

param.name: tipText
param.span: 要在气球状提示上显示的文本。

span.span: The text to display on the balloon tip.
One of the values.

summary.span: 在指定时间段内，在任务栏中显示具有指定标题、文本和图标的气球状提示。

span.span: Displays a balloon tip with the specified title, text, and icon in the taskbar for the specified time period.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最小和最大超时值是由操作系统强制执行的，并且通常分别为10和30秒，但这可能因操作系统而异。Minimum and maximum timeout values are enforced by the operating system and are typically 10 and 30 seconds, respectively, however this can vary depending on the operating system. 超时值太大或太小会调整到适当的最小值或最大值。Timeout values that are too large or too small are adjusted to the appropriate minimum or maximum value. 此外，如果用户似乎没有使用计算机（没有键盘或鼠标事件发生），则系统不会将此时间计入超时值。In addition, if the user does not appear to be using the computer (no keyboard or mouse events are occurring) then the system does not count this time towards the timeout. 任务栏上每次只能显示一个气球状提示。Only one balloon tip can display on the taskbar at a time. 如果任务栏当前显示一个气球状提示，则会导致忽略 `timeout` 值。Attempting to display a balloon tip when one is currently displayed on the taskbar causes the `timeout` value to be ignored. 此行为稍有不同，具体取决于操作系统以及气球提示是来自其他还是相同的应用程序。The behavior is slightly different depending on the operating system and whether the balloon tip is from another, or the same, application. 当第二个气球提示来自其他应用程序时，将在第二个气球提示显示最小超时值，而不考虑 `timeout`的值。When the second balloon tip is from another application, the first balloon tip will display for the minimum timeout value before the second appears, regardless of the value of `timeout`. 在大多数情况下，如果气球提示来自同一应用程序，则在调用 方法时，第一个气球提示会立即关闭。In most cases, if the balloon tips are from the same application, the first balloon tip immediately closes when another call to the method is made. 在某些情况下，第二个气球会在第一个气球顶部打开。In some cases the second balloon will open on top of the first balloon. 标题文本将以粗体显示在气球顶部附近。The title text will display in a bold font near the top of the balloon. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 若要运行此示例，请将示例代码粘贴到包含名为 `notifyIcon1`的 的 Windows 窗体中。To run this example, paste the example code into a Windows Form that contains a named `notifyIcon1`. 将此示例中的 `Form1_DoubleClick` 方法与窗体的 事件关联。Associate the `Form1_DoubleClick` method in this example with the form's event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIconBalloonTip#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIconBalloonTip/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIconBalloonTip#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIconBalloonTip/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置当鼠标指针停留在通知区域图标上时显示的工具提示文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the ToolTip text displayed when the mouse pointer rests on a notification area icon.

value.span: 当鼠标指针停留在通知区域图标上时显示的工具提示文本。

span.span: The ToolTip text displayed when the mouse pointer rests on a notification area icon.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `null`文本，则不会显示工具提示。If the text is `null`, no ToolTip is displayed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类在通知区域中显示应用程序的图标。The following code example demonstrates using the class to display an icon for an application in the notification area. 该示例演示如何设置 、、和 属性以及如何处理 事件。The example demonstrates setting the , , , and properties and handling the event. 对其使用**Exit**项的 分配给 属性，该属性允许用户关闭应用程序。A with an **Exit** item on it is assigned to the property, which allows the user to close the application. 发生 事件时，通过调用 方法来激活应用程序窗体。When the event occurs, the application form is activated by calling the method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: ToolTip text is more than 63 characters long.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示任务栏的通知区域是否会显示图标。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the icon is visible in the notification area of the taskbar.

value.span: 如果通知区域显示图标，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the icon is visible in the notification area; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于默认值为 `false`，因此，若要使图标显示在通知区域中，则必须将 属性设置为 "`true`"。Since the default value is `false`, in order for the icon to show up in the notification area, you must set the property to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类在通知区域中显示应用程序的图标。The following code example demonstrates using the class to display an icon for an application in the notification area. 该示例演示如何设置 、、和 属性以及如何处理 事件。The example demonstrates setting the , , , and properties and handling the event. 对其使用**Exit**项的 分配给 属性，该属性允许用户关闭应用程序。A with an **Exit** item on it is assigned to the property, which allows the user to close the application. 发生 事件时，通过调用 方法来激活应用程序窗体。When the event occurs, the application form is activated by calling the method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon/VB/source.vb#1)]
